title: Age structure diagram - identify negative growth

content.question: Which of the following age structure diagrams represents a population that most likely has a negative growth rate?

choices.label: Option A presents an age-structure diagram in which the bars at the base are approximately the same size, tapering toward the top.
Option B presents an age-structure diagram that has the shape of a pyramid with a very wide base and a very pointed peak.
Option C presents an age-structure diagram that has a moderate base, is widest just below the middle, and narrows toward the top.
Option D presents an age-structure diagram that has a narrow base, increases to its widest point about halfway up the diagram, and then begins to narrow again.
Option E presents an age-structure diagram that has the shape of a pyramid with a moderate base that tapers to a somewhat pointed peak.

content.answer: Option D presents an age-structure diagram that has a narrow base, increases to its widest point about halfway up the diagram, and then begins to narrow again.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
